name: The Hunt (itch) (UnSanskari)
description:
Theme: Two-views

Play as both the hunter and the hunted in this minimalistic game which relies more on listening to where your opponent is coming from or running too!

I intended to keep this game purely audio focused but was unable to make it satisfactorily so before the end of the game jam, so, for now, I have added some visual elements to make the game easier to understand and play! 

Music credit: Abhay Gupta
https://open.spotify.com/track/4d7A0oqprGuIyVqHtDpcX1?si=sXSiKw4iS6Sagr6LnsIg8Q&...
